meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beefy.
meanings.sent1: Her beefiness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The boxer's beefiness helped him win the match.
meanings.sent3: The tiny dog tried to imitate the beefiness of the big bulldog.
meanings.sent4: His beefiness in the gym was like a mountain among hills.
meanings.sent5: The beefiness of the steak was so satisfying and juicy.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a muscular or robust physique.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's beefiness was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: His beefiness came from years of hard work at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The beefiness of the bodybuilder was unmatched at the competition.
meanings.sent4: Her beefiness on the field was like a force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The beefiness of the wrestler was intimidating yet impressive.
